evidence.claim: Rest Assured Home Care uses AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA standards, implying the use of health tech protocols like FHIR and HL7.
They offer integration through REST APIs as part of their service offerings.
Use of Twilio for communication services, which may relate to patient communications.

icp.icp_reason: No specific use cases found related to X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities.
